applet_name: Add songs from videos you like to a Spotify playlist
applet_description: This Applet will search the title of the video on Spotify ‚Äî if it finds the track, it'll add it to a "YouTube" playlist. Not all songs on YouTube are available on Spotify. Happy tune hunting!

applet_name: Automatically Tweet the videos you like
